name: Avoid Procedures using RETURN statements (PL1)
description: This rule searches for all the PL1 Procedures and PL1 Functions using RETURN statements.
output:
The report lists all the PL1 Procedures and PL1 Functions using RETURN statements.

It provides following information: 
-  PL1 Procedure and PL1 Function full name
rationale: RETURN statement should not be used in PL1 Procedures.
remediation: Replace the RETURN statement in the procedures.
sample:
CALL CAST TEST;        
 IF TEST1 THEN RETURN;
total: Number of PL1 Procedures and PL1 Functions

technicalCriteria.name: Complexity - Algorithmic and Control Structure Complexity
